pages.text: 冥想是一种对人益处多多的锻炼方式，可以同时提升人的精神以及物理层面的健康程度。$(br)然而，想要让冥想充分生效，冥想之人必须先打破边界，也就是杀死$(marked)银白门径$()。
若要开始冥想，你必须在床上小憩片刻，这对于时间并不作要求。小憩过后，你的生命恢复速度以及源力恢复速度都会得到增加。$(br)但，冥想还可以通幽于情感之中，只需一些独特的影响即可进入那幽深之境。。。这种影响就是$(marked)沉醉$()，而$(l:alchemy/entry_tincture)神秘鸦片酊$()就是我们迈入沉醉之中的钥匙。$(br)这些被急剧放大了的情感会给予我们各不相同的效果。
$(l)满足$()$(br)满足与其它的情感一样，可以增加源力恢复速度。它也能够提升你的跳跃高度，行走以及挖掘的速度。$(br2)$(l)惊惧$()$(br)惊惧也会使得源力恢复速度增加，且增加量比满足略高。然而，它还会带来霉运以及虚弱效果，作为补偿，它还会附加上比较微弱的保护效果。

$(l)Ecstasy$()$(br)This emotion fuels the cultist with desire，even thriving in their body's health，though the weakest desire brings no benefits to Magan regeneration at all。For this，a greater power of ecstasy might be required。$(br2)$(l)Fear$()$(br)Fear will set the cultist in a constant state of insecurity，increasing their capabilities in fleeing，but never helping with Magan regeneration.

$(l)Laughter$()$(br)While not being an emotion in the traditional sense，this sentiment is completely unstoppable，until it ceases on its own。It will immensely increase the regeneration of Magan.$(br2)$(l)Silence$()$(br)Not really being the opposite of laughter，but not really being anything in general，this emotion will prevent all Magan regeneration，but will increase strength and resistance.

The probability of one of these being applied may be manipulated with certain means，like special $(marked)perfumes$()。However，one can only obtain emotions by meditation when intoxicated，and this counts always.
